long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"✨ Save endless copies. Copy & Paste without limits! 🔄

With the **CopyToMe** extension, you can copy as much text as you want, whenever you need it, all from the convenience of your browser.

🖱️💻 Say goodbye to losing important snippets text or notes!

"CopyToMe" uses **Chrome Storage** to securely store all your copied text right on your device, even if you close your browser or shut down your computer. 💾🔒

Whether you're collecting research, gathering quotes, or keeping notes from multiple pages, CopyToMe is your perfect productivity sidekick! 📝📚 No more worrying about overwriting your clipboard—just copy, paste, and retrieve it whenever you need. 🚀

Plus, it’s fast, reliable, and works seamlessly in the background. 📂✨ You focus on what matters while CopyToMe takes care of the rest. Your copies are just a click away!"

🔧 New Update v1.2 🔄
